text: Nguibar ekiar kaba, ia uari mongamin nguibabar mɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ gumazir aremezimɨn namakatam an ovevem ikaraghan iburagham. Gumazitam tav mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham, a deravɨra ikɨ egh mangɨ kotiamɨn tugham. Eghtɨ me an kotiam baregh deraghvɨra fogh suam, a guizbangɨra gumazir igharazim mɨsoghezɨ an areme, eghtɨ kamaghɨn, me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham.
